channel.title: Hello everyone, I'm Nick Cook
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm Nick Cook. I've been on the 'other' side of IT for over 10 years now - doing IT sysadmin duties for various companies and been out running my own IT consulting firm for about 3 years now.
I've always been interested in building a product, I even lurked the Joel boards back in the day. I've been focusing on learning Rails over the last few months and trying to get a rough prototype product built. I'm having a great time, and am finding the whole bootstrapped community full of amazing people.
I hope to be able to contribute and learn from everyone here!

item.title: Hello everyone, I'm Nick Cook
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hello Nick. Welcome to the forums.

item.title: Hello everyone, I'm Nick Cook
item.dc:creator: nrcook
item.description:
Hey everyone, I’m Nick Cook. I’ve been on the ‘other’ side of IT for over 10 years now - doing IT sysadmin duties for various companies and been out running my own IT consulting firm for about 3 years now.

I’ve always been interested in building a product, I even lurked the Joel boards back in the day. I’ve been focusing on learning Rails over the last few months and trying to get a rough prototype product built. I’m having a great time, and am finding the whole bootstrapped community full of amazing people.

I hope to be able to contribute and learn from everyone here!
